attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are outraged that the Chief Executive of Lloyds TSB - Eric Daniels  as reported today in the Metro - should tell his staff that their bonus's are safe and that executives too will get their bonus's as shares. He should be sacked immediatly and none of these people who have wrecked the British and world economy should be rewarded in any way. The Government should stop this immediatly.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
